doc:
Larry Gelman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_Gelman 0 Larry Gelman (born November 3, 1930) is an American film and television character actor. He is best known for playing Dr. Bernie Tupperman on the US TV series The Bob Newhart Show and Vinnie, the poker playing friend of Oscar and Felix, in the original TV series version of The Odd Couple. He also made numerous appearances as Dr. Hubie Binder in the US TV series Maude and as officer Bernstein on Eight Is Enough. He played Max as a regular member of the cast of the sitcom Needles and Pins, which ran for 14 episodes in the autumn of 1973. Gelman has appeared in many other popular American television series, including The Monkees (3 episodes), Batman, Get Smart, My Three Sons, The Doris Day Show (3 episodes), The Mary Tyler Moore Show, The Carol Burnett Show, Rhoda, Kojak (2 episodes), Quincy M.E., CHiPS, The Love Boat, Laverne Shirley, Mork Mindy, One Day at a Time (2 episodes), Barney Miller (4 episodes), The Facts of Life, Simon Simon, Hill Street Blues, Remington Steele, Cagney Lacey (3 episodes), Scarecrow and Mrs. King, Mr. Belvedere (2 episodes), In the Heat of the Night (2 episodes), Night Court (3 episodes), Doogie Howser, M.D., Touched by an Angel and ER. In film, Gelman appeared (credited as Larry Spelman) in the X-rated 1976 film Alice in Wonderland with Kristine DeBell, and the adult comedy Chatterbox (1977) starring Candice Rialson. He also had roles in Disney's Superdad (1973), The Strongest Man in the World (1975), Tunnel Vision (1976), Raid on Entebbe (1977), The Triangle Factory Fire Scandal (1979), The Frisco Kid (1979), O'Hara's Wife (1982), Dreamscape (1984), Girls Just Want to Have Fun (1985), The Naked Cage (1986) and Mr. Saturday Night (1992). Gelman also played Professor Albert Einstein in the real-time strategy games Command Conquer: Red Alert 2 and Command Conquer: Yuri's Revenge. Larry_Gelman ( born November_3_,_1930 ) is an_American_film_and_television_character_actor . He is_best_known for playing Dr._Bernie_Tupperman on the_US_TV_series The_Bob_Newhart_Show and Vinnie , the_poker_playing_friend of Oscar_and_Felix , in the_original_TV_series_version of The_Odd_Couple . He also made numerous_appearances as Dr._Hubie_Binder in the_US_TV_series_Maude and as officer_Bernstein on Eight Is Enough . He played Max as a_regular_member of the_cast of the_sitcom_Needles_and_Pins , which ran for 14_episodes in the_autumn of 1973 . Gelman has_appeared in many_other_popular_American_television_series , including The_Monkees ( 3_episodes_)_,_Batman_, Get Smart , My_Three_Sons , The_Doris_Day_Show ( 3_episodes_) , The_Mary_Tyler_Moore_Show , The_Carol_Burnett_Show , Rhoda , Kojak_(_2_episodes_) , Quincy_M.E. , CHiPS , The_Love_Boat , Laverne_ , Mork_ , One_Day at a_Time_(_2_episodes_) , Barney_Miller ( 4_episodes_) , The_Facts of Life_,_Simon_ , Hill_Street_Blues , Remington_Steele , Cagney_ ( 3_episodes_)_,_Scarecrow_and_Mrs._King , Mr._Belvedere ( 2_episodes_) , In the_Heat of the_Night_(_2_episodes_) , Night_Court ( 3_episodes_) , Doogie_Howser , M.D. , Touched by an_Angel_and_ER . In film , Gelman appeared_(_credited as Larry_Spelman_) in the_X-rated_1976_film_Alice in Wonderland with Kristine_DeBell , and the_adult_comedy_Chatterbox ( 1977 ) starring Candice_Rialson . He also had roles in Disney 's_Superdad_(_1973_) , The_Strongest_Man in the_World_(_1975_) , Tunnel_Vision_(_1976_) , Raid on Entebbe_(_1977_) , The_Triangle_Factory_Fire_Scandal ( 1979_) , The_Frisco_Kid_(_1979_) , O'Hara 's_Wife_(_1982_) , Dreamscape_(_1984_) , Girls Just Want_to_Have Fun_(_1985_) , The_Naked_Cage_(_1986_) and Mr._Saturday_Night_(_1992_) . Gelman also played Professor_Albert_Einstein in the_real-time_strategy_games_Command_ : Red_Alert_2 and Command_ : Yuri 's_Revenge .
